sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PAYR0309 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , PYMT_YR_MNTH , PAY_CD , PAYR_SEIL_NUM , HLTH_INSUR_FLUC_DT , HLTH_INSR_PAY_TOT_AMNT , HLTH_INSR_MNTH_RUNTN_AMNT , HLTH_INSR_GRDE , HLTH_INSR_CERT_NUM , NAT_PENN_INSUR_FLUC_DT , NAT_PENN_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT , NAT_PENN_GRDE , HLTH_INSR_APPTN_YN , NAT_PENN_APPTN_YN , UMYT_INSR_APPTN_YN , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_APPTN_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , UMYT_INSR_FLUC_DT , UMYT_INSR_PAY_TOT_AMNT , UMYT_INSR_PAY_MNTH_AMNT , IDTL_ACCDT_FLUC_DT , IDTL_ACCDT_PAY_TOT_AMNT , IDTL_ACCDT_PAY_MNTH_AMNT ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #pymtYrMnth# , #payCd# , #payrSeilNum# , #hlthInsurFlucDt# , #hlthInsrPayTotAmnt# , #hlthInsrMnthRuntnAmnt# , #hlthInsrGrde# , #hlthInsrCertNum# , #natPennInsurFlucDt# , #natPennStdIncmMnthAmnt# , #natPennGrde# , #hlthInsrApptnYn# , #natPennApptnYn# , #umytInsrApptnYn# , #idtlAccdtInsurApptnYn# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# , #umytInsrFlucDt# , #umytInsrPayTotAmnt# , #umytInsrPayMnthAmnt# , #idtlAccdtFlucDt# , #idtlAccdtPayTotAmnt# , #idtlAccdtPayMnthAmnt# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PAYR0309 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , PYMT_YR_MNTH=#pymtYrMnth# , PAY_CD=#payCd# , PAYR_SEIL_NUM=#payrSeilNum# , HLTH_INSUR_FLUC_DT=#hlthInsurFlucDt# , HLTH_INSR_PAY_TOT_AMNT=#hlthInsrPayTotAmnt# , HLTH_INSR_MNTH_RUNTN_AMNT=#hlthInsrMnthRuntnAmnt# , HLTH_INSR_GRDE=#hlthInsrGrde# , HLTH_INSR_CERT_NUM=#hlthInsrCertNum# , NAT_PENN_INSUR_FLUC_DT=#natPennInsurFlucDt# , NAT_PENN_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT=#natPennStdIncmMnthAmnt# , NAT_PENN_GRDE=#natPennGrde# , HLTH_INSR_APPTN_YN=#hlthInsrApptnYn# , NAT_PENN_APPTN_YN=#natPennApptnYn# , UMYT_INSR_APPTN_YN=#umytInsrApptnYn# , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_APPTN_YN=#idtlAccdtInsurApptnYn# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# , UMYT_INSR_FLUC_DT=#umytInsrFlucDt# , UMYT_INSR_PAY_TOT_AMNT=#umytInsrPayTotAmnt# , UMYT_INSR_PAY_MNTH_AMNT=#umytInsrPayMnthAmnt# , IDTL_ACCDT_FLUC_DT=#idtlAccdtFlucDt# , IDTL_ACCDT_PAY_TOT_AMNT=#idtlAccdtPayTotAmnt# , IDTL_ACCDT_PAY_MNTH_AMNT=#idtlAccdtPayMnthAmnt# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND PYMT_YR_MNTH=#pymtYrMnth# AND PAY_CD=#payCd# AND PAYR_SEIL_NUM=#payrSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PAYR0309 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND PYMT_YR_MNTH=#pymtYrMnth# AND PAY_CD=#payCd# AND PAYR_SEIL_NUM=#payrSeilNum#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , PYMT_YR_MNTH , PAY_CD , PAYR_SEIL_NUM , HLTH_INSUR_FLUC_DT , HLTH_INSR_PAY_TOT_AMNT , HLTH_INSR_MNTH_RUNTN_AMNT , HLTH_INSR_GRDE , HLTH_INSR_CERT_NUM , NAT_PENN_INSUR_FLUC_DT , NAT_PENN_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT , NAT_PENN_GRDE , HLTH_INSR_APPTN_YN , NAT_PENN_APPTN_YN , UMYT_INSR_APPTN_YN , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_APPTN_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , UMYT_INSR_FLUC_DT , UMYT_INSR_PAY_TOT_AMNT , UMYT_INSR_PAY_MNTH_AMNT , IDTL_ACCDT_FLUC_DT , IDTL_ACCDT_PAY_TOT_AMNT , IDTL_ACCDT_PAY_MNTH_AMNT FROM PAYR0309 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND PYMT_YR_MNTH=#pymtYrMnth# AND PAY_CD=#payCd# AND PAYR_SEIL_NUM=#payrSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , PYMT_YR_MNTH , PAY_CD , PAYR_SEIL_NUM , HLTH_INSUR_FLUC_DT , HLTH_INSR_PAY_TOT_AMNT , HLTH_INSR_MNTH_RUNTN_AMNT , HLTH_INSR_GRDE , HLTH_INSR_CERT_NUM , NAT_PENN_INSUR_FLUC_DT , NAT_PENN_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT , NAT_PENN_GRDE , HLTH_INSR_APPTN_YN , NAT_PENN_APPTN_YN , UMYT_INSR_APPTN_YN , IDTL_ACCDT_INSUR_APPTN_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , UMYT_INSR_FLUC_DT , UMYT_INSR_PAY_TOT_AMNT , UMYT_INSR_PAY_MNTH_AMNT , IDTL_ACCDT_FLUC_DT , IDTL_ACCDT_PAY_TOT_AMNT , IDTL_ACCDT_PAY_MNTH_AMNT FROM PAYR0309 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , PYMT_YR_MNTH DESC , PAY_CD DESC , PAYR_SEIL_NUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PAYR0309 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
